health_discussed_people_names: Hon (Ms) Akinyi, Hon Faraj, Hon Mohamed Hatimy, Hon Patrick Siminyu, Hon Jimmy Odari, Hon Wangudi Stephen, Hon Saad Faraj, Hon Ahmed Ebrahim Omar, Hon Nasser Rashid
health_data_challenges: The discussions identified the challenge of determining the jurisdiction and responsibility between the County Government and the National Government regarding issues like asbestos removal in schools.
health_service_delivery_improvement_reco: The recommendations included collaborating with the National Government to address the issue of asbestos in schools, ensuring proper allocation of funds for health and education, and amending laws to support health initiatives.
health_sector_decisions: No decisions were made specifically related to the health sector.
health_evidence_base: The discussions were based on the health risks associated with asbestos and the need to prioritize health and safety in schools.
